name: MyHatch
description: We're making searching for the perfect place to live so much easier for our users.   We are offering truly personalised search using AI driven home and neighbourhood recommendations, based on lifestyle, budget and those all important property must-haves.  ​

team.title: Proposition Manager
team.name: Jenni Clutten
team.bioHtml: Connection maker - fusing analytics, social policy and project management.

team.name: Samuel Foxman
team.bioHtml: Set up four successful new ventures, working in senior management during the hiring phase or fundraising. Economics and International Development.

jobs.title: Front End Developer
jobs.description:
We’re looking for a Front End Developer who has the passion and skill to work across our exciting and varied products to build great user experiences.

About MyHatch:

MyHatch is here to empower people to find their dream home. By really getting to know what you’re looking for in your next home, we’re able to show you truly personalised property recommendations by using state of the art technology. We’re making searching for the perfect place to live so much easier for our users by offering truly personalised search using AI-driven home and neighbourhood recommendations, based on lifestyle, budget and those all-important property must-haves.

You'll be:
Working as part of our Development team to translate the vision of our design teams into beautiful HTML/CSS code 
Making our desktop, tablet, and mobile interfaces seamlessly smooth and pixel perfect, bringing a keen eye for design into this technical role
​
We'd love to hear from you if:​
You have strong knowledge & experience in React, ES6, Redux, CSS3 & SASS
You're familiar with testing component based frameworks
You're familiar with unix-based operating systems and terminal
You have good understanding of version control systems (we use Git)
You're willing to expand your skill-set by learning new technologies and methods to create high quality prototypes and code

Working for us means:​
A competitive salary
Market-leading benefits package, including discounted products and services
A ludicrously generous pension (up to 23%!)
24 days holiday (+ bank holidays) + the option of 10 extra days 
Annual bonus
2 days to spend supporting charities
A learning and development budget so that you can choose your own development path
Flexible working 
Regular socials, including team lunches, drinks and an annual retreat somewhere lovely to detox or retox, your call!
Your own desk plant to look after
Cycle to work scheme

Apply here
https://nationwide.avature.net/rentalproposition

jobs.title: QA Tester
jobs.description:
We’re moving fast at MyHatch to get prototypes, concepts and apps live, so we're looking for a pragmatic, product focused QA tester to make sure we're releasing high quality products for our users.

About MyHatch:

MyHatch is here to empower people to find their dream home. By really getting to know what you’re looking for in your next home, we’re able to show you truly personalised property recommendations by using state of the art technology. We’re making searching for the perfect place to live so much easier for our users by offering truly personalised search using AI-driven home and neighbourhood recommendations, based on lifestyle, budget and those all-important property must-haves.

You’ll be:
Testing that new features, prototypes and analytics are performing as intended
Classifying, logging, reproducing and prioritising bugs
Hunting for edge cases
​
We'd love to hear from you if:
You have experience in a startup or agile environment and understand how to balance quality of output against tight delivery deadlines
You have a keen eye for detail for every component of the product
You're excited by the challenge of being the product's primary tester and be part of creating a framework for testing going forward

Working for us means:​
A competitive salary
Market-leading benefits package, including discounted products and services
A ludicrously generous pension (up to 23%!)
24 days holiday (+ bank holidays) + the option of 10 extra days 
Annual bonus
2 days to spend supporting charities
A learning and development budget so that you can choose your own development path
Flexible working 
Regular socials, including team lunches, drinks and an annual retreat somewhere lovely to detox or retox, your call!
Your own desk plant to look after
Cycle to work scheme


Apply Now:
https://nationwide.avature.net/rentalproposition

jobs.title: Experienced UI/UX Designer
jobs.description:
We’ve got a pretty impressive team of product owners and researchers who need a talented designer to bring the vision for our products to life and to create designs that put the user at the heart of the decisions we make.

About MyHatch:

MyHatch is here to empower people to find their dream home. By really getting to know what you’re looking for in your next home, we’re able to show you truly personalised property recommendations by using state of the art technology. We’re making searching for the perfect place to live so much easier for our users by offering truly personalised search using AI-driven home and neighbourhood recommendations, based on lifestyle, budget and those all-important property must-haves.

You’ll be:
Working closely with product owners in the ideation process to turn concepts into beautiful digital products
Building rapid prototypes for user testing
Creating UX and UI assets for our range of products
​
We'd love to hear from you if:
You have plenty of experience in B2C UI/UX or other relevant design experience
You've got a great portfolio that shows off your impressive skills
You have experience designing responsive and elegant web interfaces and user flows using InVision and Sketch

Working for us means:​
A competitive salary
Market-leading benefits package, including discounted products and services
A ludicrously generous pension (up to 23%!)
24 days holiday (+ bank holidays) + the option of 10 extra days 
Annual bonus
2 days to spend supporting charities
A learning and development budget so that you can choose your own development path
Flexible working 
Regular socials, including team lunches, drinks and an annual retreat somewhere lovely to detox or retox, your call!
Your own desk plant to look after
Cycle to work scheme


Apply here
https://nationwide.avature.net/rentalproposition

jobs.title: Developer
jobs.description:
We're on the hunt for a passionate developer who is obsessed with designing, developing and installing software solutions.

About MyHatch:

MyHatch is here to empower people to find their dream home. By really getting to know what you’re looking for in your next home, we’re able to show you truly personalised property recommendations by using state of the art technology. We’re making searching for the perfect place to live so much easier for our users by offering truly personalised search using AI-driven home and neighbourhood recommendations, based on lifestyle, budget and those all-important property must-haves.

​We'd love to hear from you if:​
- You have strong knowledge & experience in Python and web framework like Django or Flask
- You have experience with SQL and NoSQL databases (MariaDB / MySQL and MongoDB will be very beneficial!)
- You have strong knowledge & experience in React, ES6, Redux, CSS3 & SASS
- You are familiar with microservices architectures and RESTful API concepts
- You have a strong knowledge of algorithms and data structure
- You have experience of working in team with version control systems (we use Git)
- You are familiar with unix-based operating systems and terminal
- You are familiar with testing component based frameworks
- You have good problem solving skills
- You are willing to expand your skill-set by learning new technologies and methods to create high quality prototypes and code
You're familiar with the software development life cycle (SDLC) from preliminary system analysis to tests and deployment


Working for us means:​
A competitive salary
Market-leading benefits package, including discounted products and services
A ludicrously generous pension (up to 23%!)
24 days holiday (+ bank holidays) + the option of 10 extra days 
Annual bonus
2 days to spend supporting charities
A learning and development budget so that you can choose your own development path
Flexible working 
Regular socials, including team lunches, drinks and an annual retreat somewhere lovely to detox or retox, your call!
Your own desk plant to look after
Cycle to work scheme

Interested? Apply here:
https://nationwide.avature.net/rentalproposition

jobs.title: Python Developer
jobs.description:
Python Developer - Clerkenwell Based 



We are a vibrant, lively team based in the heart of Clerkenwell. We are all extremely passionate about technology and we are totally committed to helping London's renters. 
We're fully funded by Nationwide Building Society and we are growing rapidly with plans to double our team by the end of the year. 
We’ve got a pretty impressive team on board already, so you’ll be working with some of the best within a collaborative and thriving environment

We are a hard working bunch but we make sure we're enjoying each other's company both in and outside of the office, with plenty of socials and opportunities to unwind after busy days. We are looking for a Python Developer who has the passion and skill to work across our various product lines within our exciting business.

About MyHatch:

MyHatch is here to empower people to find their dream home. By really getting to know what you’re looking for in your next home, we’re able to show you truly personalised property recommendations by using state of the art technology. We’re making searching for the perfect place to live so much easier for our users by offering a truly personalised search which utilises our proprietary AI based search algorithms.

We’d love to hear from you if:

You're familiar with the software development life cycle (SDLC) from preliminary system analysis to tests and deployment
You have experience in developing with Python
You have experience within Node and Tension Flow AI would be advantageous
You’re experience in Mongo
You're familiar with testing component based frameworks
You're familiar with unix-based operating systems and terminal
You have good understanding of version control systems (we use Git)
You're willing to expand your skill-set by learning new technologies and methods to create high quality prototypes and code




Working for us means: ​ 


A competitive salary 
Market-leading benefits package, including discounted products and services 
A ludicrously generous pension (up to 23%!) 
24 days holiday (+ bank holidays) + the option of 10 extra days 
Annual bonus 
2 days to spend supporting charities 
A learning and development budget so that you can choose your own development path 
Flexible working 
Regular socials, including team lunches, drinks and an annual retreat somewhere lovely to detox or retox, your call! 
Your own desk plant to look after 
Cycle to work scheme

Apply here 
https://nationwide.avature.net/rentalproposition

jobs.title: Product Manager - Software Application
jobs.description:
Tactical Product Manager Role- Clerkenwell, London



We are a vibrant, lively team based in the heart of Clerkenwell. We are all extremely passionate about technology and we are totally committed to helping London's renters. 
We're fully funded by Nationwide Building Society and we are growing rapidly with plans to double our team by the end of the year. 
We’ve got a pretty impressive team on board already, so you’ll be working with some of the best within a collaborative and thriving environment

We are a hard working bunch but we make sure we're enjoying each other's company both in and outside of the office, with plenty of socials and opportunities to unwind after busy days. We are looking for a Product Manager who has the passion and skill to work across our exciting business.

About MyHatch:
MyHatch is here to empower people to find their dream home. By really getting to know what you’re looking for in your next home, we’re able to show you truly personalised property recommendations by using state of the art technology. We’re making searching for the perfect place to live so much easier for our users by offering a truly personalised search which utilises our proprietary AI based search algorithms.

We’d love to hear from you if:

You will manage product plan by ensuring changes in market and business priorities including integration needs and technology advancements are reflected. You will present status updates.
You will be supporting and articulating a clear vision of success and how goals and objectives will be achieved.
You will prepare and present product plans. Identify risks and challenges, opportunities and growth strategies, business integration needs and retirement plans.
You will prepare and present product roadmap reviews as well as providing product’s general strategic direction.
You will be supporting project inventory during budget planning process, interlock on all companion activity and prioritize as necessary to execute against plan throughout the year. You will determine release dates.
You will provide content for product roadmaps, ensure timely delivery and provide business reasons for any changes/revisions made to roadmaps.
You will act as product launch manager when appropriate for new products or rollouts of major releases.
You will be working closely with the development team, 
You will be experienced in writing user stories, user cases...
Managing the backlog, facilitating sprint planning sessions, demos etc
Supporting the development of the business case for the overall product.
Tracking Product Analytics , and monitoring KPIs throughout the Product Lifecycle


What skills, experience & behaviours we look for?
Preferably educated to degree level, with marketing / business / technical degree and / or professional marketing qualification
Knowledge of the Property Rental Market and associated products would be advantageous.
Excellent skills in communicating ideas both verbally and in written form in a clear, concise and professional manner
Ability to utilize judgment in decision making process and decisions related to job tasks
Ability to communicate effectively with all levels of management in an organized, professional manner
Team skills, including ability to establish and maintain effective working relationships with all levels within organization, internally and externally
Requires strong time management skills, attention to detail and must be resourceful
Analytical, problem solving skills
Project management skills; ability to prioritize and complete tasks
This is a Rapid moving environment here at MyHatch

Working for us means: ​ 


A competitive salary 
Market-leading benefits package, including discounted products and services 
A ludicrously generous pension (up to 23%!) 
24 days holiday (+ bank holidays) + the option of 10 extra days 
Annual bonus 
2 days to spend supporting charities 
A learning and development budget so that you can choose your own development path 
Flexible working 
Regular socials, including team lunches, drinks and an annual retreat somewhere lovely to detox or retox, your call! 
Your own desk plant to look after 
Cycle to work scheme

Apply here 
https://nationwide.avature.net/rentalproposition
